info.title: Setu Insights API
info.description: Setu's Insights API gives you actionable insights from a customer's bank statement about their income, expenditure, and financial history.

post.description: Call this API to create a new template containing static and configurable insights.

insight.name: amt_last_n_mon
insight.title: Operations on Transaction Amounts of last n months

get.description: Call this API to retrieve all existing templates.

insight.title: Operations on Transaction Amounts of last n months

post.description: Call this API with the data received from FIP's notification as payload, to create an FI DataBlock. Note: This data can be auto-fetched from FIP with FIU's consent.

holder.name: PRATIK JAIN

requestBody.description: FI Data as defined by ReBIT schema

get.summary: Get supported banks for PDF processing
get.description: Retrieve a list of banks supported for PDF statement processing

post.summary: Upload PDF bank statement for processing
post.description: Call this API to upload a PDF bank statement for processing and data extraction

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Reference ID for tracking the PDF upload

bankName.description: Name of the bank that issued the statement

password.description: Password for the PDF if it's encrypted

201.description: PDF uploaded and processing started successfully

post.description: Call this API with the template-id received from Setu along with a list of data-ids, to trigger an Report generation job. The FI Datablocks can belong to multiple bank accounts.The created Report will be shared via a notification to the endpoint configured by the FIU.This API will respond with a report-id, which can also be used to fetch the generated Report.

get.description: Call this API with the report-id to get the created Insights

schema.title: Report ID for which insights are needed
Response 200 Get Insights V2 Insight Get

delete.description: Call this API to delete all data associated with a specific reference ID (refId). This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: The reference ID for which data should be purged

value.errorMsg: Unable to authenticate with provided credentials
No data found for the provided refId
